Name: Reggae Rum Punch
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge, Luxardo Maraschino Cherry & mint sprigs bouquet.
Review: Jamaicans have a sweet tooth and love their rum. This drink combines sweetness, potent rum, and generous fruit.
History: The most popular punch in Jamaica, where it is sold under different names with slightly varying ingredients. It always contains orange, pineapple and most importantly, overproof rum.
Nutrition: One serving of Reggae Rum Punch contains 176 calories
